homeHeader.title: Dubai Free Zone Business Setup Simplified — Start, Grow & Unlock Global Opportunities
homeHeader.description: Choosing the wrong Free Zone, or lacking local knowledge and trusted guidance, can make starting a business in Dubai overwhelming. At One Nexuz,  we simplify the process with a tailored Free Zones business setup across 25+ high-growth free zones. With the UAE's booming economy, 100% foreign ownership, zero taxes, and direct access to major sea ports and airports, Dubai Free Zones are the ideal starting point. Our expert consultants offer tailored freezone company setup solutions in Dubai.

leftSection_1.title: Why Join the 150 Million Businesses in Dubai Free Zone?
leftSection_1.description: Expand into the Dubai free zones to grow faster, spend smarter, and reach local & global markets. The city’s dynamic tax environment makes it the perfect launchpad for startups and multinational firms alike.

items.title: Uplift Business Growth, Tap Into Opportunities, and Expand Confidently
items.subTitle: Uplift Business Growth, Tap Into Opportunities, and Expand Confidently
items.description: With 4.4% YoY economic growth and a location bridging Asia, Europe, and Africa, Dubai stands as one of the world’s most dynamic business hubs. Its Free Zones provide streamlined setup, world-class infrastructure, and access to thriving global trade routes — giving businesses the speed, stability, and scale to grow with confidence.

items.title: Gain 100% Foreign Ownership, Retain Control, and Maximise Profits
items.subTitle: Gain 100% Foreign Ownership, Retain Control, and Maximise Profits
items.description: Unlike traditional setups, Dubai Free Zones grant complete foreign ownership and 100% profit repatriation. Entrepreneurs and investors enjoy full decision-making authority and operational freedom, ensuring their businesses remain globally competitive while maximising returns.

items.title: Benefit from a Tax-Friendly Landscape, Boost Revenue, and Reinvest in Growth
items.subTitle: Benefit from a Tax-Friendly Landscape, Boost Revenue, and Reinvest in Growth
items.description: Dubai’s Free Zones offer 0% corporate and personal income tax, allowing businesses to retain more of their earnings. This tax-friendly environment boosts profitability and creates greater capacity for reinvestment, accelerating expansion across local and international markets.

items.title: Access Global & Regional Markets With Seamless Connectivity
items.subTitle: Access Global & Regional Markets With Seamless Connectivity
items.description: Dubai’s Free Zones are strategically positioned with world-class air, sea, and land logistics. Direct access to international airports, major seaports, and modern road networks ensures smooth trade flows and global reach — giving businesses a clear competitive edge in regional and international markets.

leftSection_3.title: One Nexuz Helps You Choose the Right Company Formation in Dubai Free Zone
leftSection_3.description: Simplify Dubai free zone business setup by identifying which company structure aligns with your needs:

items.title: Free Zone Establishment
items.description: Ideal for solo entrepreneurs, allowing a single shareholder to own a business fully.

items.title: Free Zone Company
items.description: FZ Co’s suits businesses with over two shareholders, offering flexibility for partnerships or corporate entities.

items.title: Branch Office
items.description: For existing companies seeking expansion, Branch Office empowers growth without the risk of losing business ownership.

sec1.title: One Nexuz Connects You with 40,000+ Businesses that are Already Thriving
sec1.description: With streamlined setup, zero tax burdens, and full foreign ownership, your business is primed to thrive from day one. Let our experts guide you every step of the way—so you can focus on scaling, not settling.

sec2.title: Launch Your Dubai Free Zone Business Affordably with One Nexuz
sec2.description: Free Zone Business setup costs don’t have to be confusing or overpriced. With one Nexuz, you can get a custom price plan tailored to your business needs — clear, affordable, and built for growth. No hidden fees, no surprises — just a smooth start for your Dubai Free Zone Journey.

leftSection_5.title: How We Set Up Your Business in the Dubai Free Zone

items.title: Book an Initial Consultation
items.description: We assess your business goals and help identify the right Dubai Free Zone — from DIFC to DMCC — aligning with your activity.

items.title: Select Legal Structure
items.description: Our team finalizes your structure (FZE, FZCO, or branch office), bundles your activities, and applies for the license in line with Dubai’s requirements.

items.title: Find Your Workspace
items.description: Choose from coworking hubs, flexi-desks, private offices, or retail spaces. Dubai Free Zones provide world-class infrastructure to fit every business model.

items.title: Secure Your Visa
items.description: We manage visas for investors, employees, and family members, with flexible quotas depending on your chosen free zone.

items.title: Open Your Bank Account
items.description: We assist in opening a business bank account in Dubai, ensuring smooth operations and global transactions.

items.title: Ongoing PRO & Compliance
items.description: From license renewals to immigration formalities, our support keeps your Dubai Free Zone business compliant, efficient, and growth-ready.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How does a mainland company differ from a free zone company?
items.answer: A mainland company in Dubai offers users unrestricted trading access across the city, as well as property ownership in these areas, whereas free zone companies operate in designated free zones, providing a tax-free environment.

items.question: Can expats own 100% of their mainland business in Dubai?
items.answer: Yes, foreign investors can enjoy 100% ownership of a mainland company in Dubai, ensuring complete control over their business.

items.question: Can my mainland company operate internationally?
items.answer: Yes, Dubai mainland companies can operate all across the UAE and the globe without restrictions.

items.question: Do I need a physical office space to set up a Dubai mainland company?
items.answer: Yes, mainland companies in Dubai must own a physical office space. Our expert consultants can help you find a cost-effective office solution to ensure compliance.

items.question: What are the average Dubai mainland company formation costs?
items.answer: The cost of setting up a mainland company can vary depending on the location, type of business activity, legal structure, and licenses. Typically, it ranges between AED 2,000 and AED 15,000.
